title: Corveth

properties.name: description
properties.value: Corveth was a follower of Zaros. During the Battle of Carrallangar, she was nearly consumed by flames; however, Ablenkian the Dragon rider and his dragon Hekala rescued her.

content:
Corveth was a follower of Zaros. During the Battle of Carrallangar, she was nearly consumed by flames; however, Ablenkian the Dragon rider and his dragon Hekala rescued her.

For unknown reasons, Corveth turned against Ablenkian after Zaros' fall and made him suffer a cruel death caused by Ripper Demons. A depiction of these events are accounted firsthand in Ablenkian's escape.
rawContent:
'''Corveth''' was a follower of [[Zaros]]. During the [[Battle of Carrallangar]], she was nearly consumed by flames; however, [[Ablenkian]] the [[Dragon rider]] and his dragon [[Hekala]] rescued her. 

For unknown reasons, Corveth turned against Ablenkian after Zaros' fall and made him suffer a cruel death caused by [[Ripper Demon]]s. A depiction of these events are accounted firsthand in [[Ablenkian's escape]].
